reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized room type identification (kitchen, bathroom, bedrooms) first, followed by distinguishing between multiple views of the same area (living room/entrance). For the kitchen, Desc_4 was matched to Image_4 based on the 'ㄇ字型料理檯面' (U-shape counter), while Desc_5 was matched to Image_5 due to the '狹長型廚房' (narrow layout) and prominent refrigerator. For the living room, Desc_3 was isolated as the close-up view of the '客廳收納牆' (Image_3). The remaining living room descriptions (Desc_1, Desc_2, Desc_11, Desc_12) were differentiated by focusing on specific features: Image_2 showed the dedicated viewing area (Desc_2), Image_1 showed the AC and wide window view (Desc_1), Image_12 emphasized the straight entrance path and clutter (Desc_11), and Image_11 provided the overall wide layout view (Desc_12). Bedroom matches were confirmed by floor type (wood vs. tile) and primary function (storage/clutter vs. study/work equipment). All 12 descriptions were successfully mapped 1:1.

matching_result_list.evidence: Living room view showing the large window ('視野開闊'), air conditioning unit ('冷氣設備現成'), and light tile floor ('地磚易清潔').
Focuses on the sofa and TV setup, confirming the '休息觀影區完整' and '家電位明確'.
Close-up view of the large open shelving unit, clearly showing '大量開放收納' and the resulting '易顯雜亂'.
Kitchen view showing the corner counter configuration consistent with 'ㄇ字型料理檯面', along with '明火烹飪設備' and '抽油煙機配置'.
View of the narrow, long kitchen hallway ('狹長型廚房') with the large refrigerator prominently visible ('冰箱位固定').
Master bedroom showing heavy stacking of boxes and items ('物品堆疊多') and a tile floor ('地面為磁磚').
Master bedroom view emphasizing the '雙人床尺度足夠' and the open doorway showing connection to the public area ('與公領域銜接佳').
Secondary bedroom featuring wood flooring ('木地板腳感佳') and a visible bookshelf/storage unit ('書櫃與置物架').
Secondary room set up as a study, featuring a printer and monitor ('工作設備齊全') and black metal open shelving ('收納以開放架為主').
Bathroom showing glass enclosure ('乾濕分離'), large vanity counter ('檯面空間大'), and dark floor tiles ('深色地磚防滑感佳').
Wide view capturing the entrance area (玄關) and the long, straight path ('動線筆直清楚') leading past the cluttered storage area ('物品堆積多').
Wide shot of the living room/entrance area emphasizing the overall layout, sufficient width ('客廳面寬足夠'), and the separation of public/private zones.
